title: Liam's fried chicken
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon plain flour', '1 1/2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '1 1/2 teaspoons ground coriander', '1 1/2 teaspoons dried sage', '1/2 teaspoon garlic powder', '1/2 teaspoon Cayenne pepper', '3 chicken breast fillets, diced', 'olive oil as needed', 'salt and pepper to taste']
